h2_title: Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm
content: Make your way to Petalfall Hamlet in Purple Cloud Mountain and run up the path until you reach a large stone gateway. Pass through the gate and turn left immediately upon entering to find a small stone staircase. Go up the stairs to find the Awaken Wine Worm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm'.
The content is as follows:
Make your way to Petalfall Hamlet in Purple Cloud Mountain and run up the path until you reach a large stone gateway. Pass through the gate and turn left immediately upon entering to find a small stone staircase. Go up the stairs to find the Awaken Wine Worm.
